dmca.title: [EV1-C2003348V] paulhobson.com/worshipteam copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net]

Posted To: Inbox

infringement
Subject: [EV1-C2003348V] paulhobson.com/worshipteam copyright
infringement

Message-ID: <45707377.1020002@phillipsdata.com>

From: Paul Phillips <paul@phillipsdata.com>
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.7 (X11/20060913)
MIME-Version: 1.0
To:  paul.hobson@gmail.com,  abuse@theplanet.com,
abuse@websitewelcome.com
Subject: paulhobson.com/worshipteam copyright infringement
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Dec 2006 18:25:10.0215 (UTC)
FILETIME=[08D99570:01C71576] 

MIME element (text/plain)
It has come to our attention that some content being hosting under
paulhobson.com was taken from our website at phillipsdata.com. 
 
The content was found at: 
 
1. www.paulhobson.com/projects/worshipteam/
2. www.paulhobson.com/projects/worshipteam/css/main-style.css 
 
The content came from: 
 
1. www.phillipsdata.com
2. www.phillipsdata.com/css/styles.css
3. www.phillipsdata.com/css/ie6.css
4. www.phillipsdata.com/css/ie7.css 
 
We are asking that our content be removed from paulhobson.com
immediately. We don't mind if sites are created by inspiration from our
own design, as long as they don't look too similar and especially that
they don't use our code. 
 
If you have any questions, do not hesitate to call or email. Thank you
for your prompt attention to this matter. 
 
 
-- 
Paul Phillips 
Software Development 
 
Phillips Data 
tel: 714.398.8132 
fax: 714.398.8158 
web: www.phillipsdata.com
